sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>Stork</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: L&D Admission orders have a phase of care of Labor and are immediately released. Postpartum orders have a phase of care of postpartum and are signed & held.</expected_result> <number>TS0002196</number> <order>22</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>SHILL</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 21:02:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2fae5593dbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961976</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>SHILL</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 21:02:59</sys_updated_on> <test>Reconcile all current orders, choosing to Continue or Not Continue as appropriate. Place the Labor & Delivery Admission Order Set, including the admission order, for the patient. Also place the postpartum orders using the OB Vaginal Delivery - Postpartum orderset. Enter a type and screen as an one off order.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001006">e59c1d5fdb9f5b0040f8fcfa0c96199a</test_script> <testing_user>OBMD</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
